Topical Trust Flow - TTF 12 Nov 2015

During the REU, I helped build a computer simulation of the DLS to quantify possible sources of systematic error. The simulation realistically models the density of stars and galaxies in the universe with realistic energy distributions. It allows the galaxies to be distorted by an input dark matter distribution and it realistically simulates the atmospheric point spread function and atmospheric noise.

First Post 11 Nov 2015
